import React, { useContext,useState } from 'react' import './TopProfile.css' import { Tooltip } from '@material-ui/core' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Context } from '../context/Context' const TopProfile = ({ topProfile }) => { const publicFolder = "http://localhost:5000/Images/" const pic = publicFolder + topProfile.photo; const { user, dispatch } = useContext(Context); const [ownProfile, setownProfile] = useState(false) // To allow edit and if (user._id == topProfile.userId) { setownProfile(true); } return ( <>
{topProfile.userName}
{ownProfile && } { ownProfile && }
{topProfile.postCount} Posts
{topProfile.friendsCount} Friends
) } export default TopProfile;
